|brand = Iomega |model = StorCenter |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = px6-300d |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = 70BG9000NA |page_start_date = 02/23/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Iomega_StorCenter_px6-300d |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;D525; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9K8G08U00-SCB0; |flash1size = 1 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8111E; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8111E; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Grub;0.9;; |stockos = Linux;3.8.13;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0, eSATA |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_esata_num = 6 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.5 |pwr_conn = AC (direct)
|serial = yes,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/12/2013 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B004Z02XW4 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B00DW1WWS2 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->

==Overview== *[http://shop.lenovo.com/us/en/servers/network-storage/lenovoemc/px6-300d/ px6-3006] is a 6 bay hot-swap NAS from [[Lenovo]] (formerly Iomega) :Ports: 2x GbE (RJ45), 1x USB 3.0, 2x USB 2.0 :P/N: 70BG9000NA
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== {{/Serial info}}
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:px6-300d_front.jpg|Front PCB File:px6-300d_back.jpg|Back of the PCB: File:px6-300d_inside.jpg|Bays and Sata connectors </gallery></center>[[Has images:internal| ]]
